title: Welcome Page Loads Successfully
description: Verify that the welcome page loads correctly with navigation options to education levels.

steps.description: Navigate to the root URL of the application.
Check that the welcome message is displayed.
Verify navigation links to education level selection page are present and visible.

title: Education Level Selection Displays Correctly
description: Verify education levels are displayed without numeric icons and user can select a level.

steps.description: From the welcome page, navigate to the education level selection page.
Check that all education levels (e.g., 1st Year, 2nd Year, 3rd Year) are listed without numeric icons.
Select an education level.
Verify that selection triggers navigation to the filieres listing for that level.

title: Filieres Listing Pagination Works Correctly
description: Verify filieres are listed in pages showing exactly 5 items per page with functional pagination controls.

steps.description: Select an education level and navigate to its filieres listing page.
Check that up to 5 filieres are displayed on the page.
Use pagination controls to navigate to the next page.
Verify the next 5 filieres are displayed.
Navigate back using pagination controls.
Verify the previous filieres page is displayed correctly.

title: Modules Listing Displays Correct Modules
description: Verify that selecting a filiere displays the accurate list of its modules.

steps.description: Select a filiere from the paginated list.
Check that the modules page displays modules associated only with the selected filiere.
Verify module titles and descriptions (if any) are properly displayed.

title: Course Materials Page Loads Correctly
description: Verify that clicking on a module navigates to a page listing downloadable course materials.

steps.description: Select a module from the modules listing.
The courses page should display the course materials available for download.
Verify that course materials include PDFs and documents with direct download links.

title: Course Material Download Works Successfully
description: Verify that clicking on a download link initiates the download of the course material without errors.

steps.description: On a course materials page, click a course material download link.
Browser should start downloading the file with the correct file type and name.
Verify that no errors are thrown during the download process.

title: Loading Spinner Displays During Data Fetch
description: Verify that the loading spinner component appears while fetching data for filieres, modules, or courses.

steps.description: Navigate to the filieres listing and trigger data fetching.
Loading spinner should be visible while the API call is ongoing.
Repeat for modules page and course materials page.
Loading spinner should appear during each data fetching operation.

title: Error Message Displays with Retry Option on API Failure
description: Verify that when an API request fails, a reusable error message component appears with a retry button that retries the request.

steps.description: Simulate API failure when fetching filieres.
Error message component with appropriate error text is displayed.
Retry button is visible and enabled.
Click retry button.
Verify that the API request is reattempted and if successful, data is loaded and error message disappears.

title: Error Boundary Catches Unexpected UI Errors
description: Verify that uncaught JavaScript errors in the UI are caught by the React error boundary and a fallback UI is displayed.

steps.description: Force an error in a component rendering (e.g., throw error in lifecycle).
Error boundary component should catch the error and replace affected UI with fallback message.
Verify the rest of the application remains functional and responsive.

title: API Client Axios Interceptors Handle Requests and Errors
description: Verify that the Axios client interceptors modify requests as expected, and handle response errors correctly.

steps.description: Make an API request using the education service through Axios client.
Verify request interceptor modifies headers or parameters as required.
Simulate API error response.
Verify response interceptor handles error correctly and passes error to UI layer.

title: Routing Navigation Preserves Application State
description: Verify that navigation using React Router between pages (welcome, levels, filieres, modules, courses) does not cause full page reloads and state persistence behaves correctly.

steps.description: Navigate from welcome page to education level selection.
Select an education level and move to filieres listing.
Navigate between filieres pages using pagination.
Use browser back and forward buttons to move through pages.
No full page reloads occur during navigation.
State such as selected education level and current filiere page is preserved correctly.

title: Pagination Component Renders Correctly and Responds to User Input
description: Verify the reusable pagination component displays page numbers and navigation controls correctly and triggers page changes on user interaction.

steps.description: Render the pagination component with multiple pages.
Check that page numbers and next/previous buttons are displayed.
Click on a page number.
Verify the component emits a page change event and updates displayed content accordingly.
Click next and previous buttons and verify page changes.

title: Handles Empty Filieres List Gracefully
description: Verify the application displays appropriate message when there are no filieres to list for a selected education level.

steps.description: Select an education level returning an empty list of filieres from the API.
Verify that an informative 'no programs found' message is displayed instead of an empty list.
Pagination controls should not be visible or enabled.

title: Handles Empty Modules List Gracefully
description: Verify the application displays appropriate message when a filiere has no modules available.

steps.description: Select a filiere that returns an empty modules list from the API.
Check that a 'no modules available' message appears instead of an empty module list.

title: Handles Empty Course Materials List Gracefully
description: Verify that the courses page shows a proper message when no course materials are available for a module.

steps.description: Navigate to a module with no course materials.
Verify a 'no course materials available' message is displayed.
